forgot-password.help-text: Enter your email address or login name below and click the Send email button. Then check your mailbox. Click the link in the received email to set a new password.

handle-token.loading: Please wait while you are being logged in

login.multiple-user-accounts-found: More than one user account found
login.user-account-not-flexworker-or-employee: Log in is restricted to flexworkers and employees

update-password.identifier-not-verified: The password change request has expired
update-password.password-min-length: The password must be at least {{minCharacters}} characters long

configuration.admin: There is a problem {{errorCode}} connecting to this page. A message is logged in elmah.io, click this link to see the message.
configuration.employee: There is a problem {{errorCode}} connecting to this page. Contact our servicedesk for more information.

annual-statements.help-text: An annual statement is a statement that an employer gives to an employee after a calendar year or upon termination of the employment contract. The annual statement provides an overview of the wage data of a whole year. Details such as payroll tax and earned income are listed on this form.

contact.help-text: Do you have any questions, comments, suggestions or complaints? Let us know. Below you can send us a message.

downloads.help-text: Here you will find a list of documents that are important for your archive. We advise you to download these documents and keep them in your administration.

payslips.help-text: The salary specification, traditionally called the payslip, is employed for the specification of the gross salary by the employer, the allowances and deductions, and net pay, taking into account the agreements in the contract and the law.

statements-status.help-text: Timesheet for which hours are saved are shown below. Timesheets are processed for payment  after approval by the relation. Processed timesheets will be visible for 28 days.

your-information.changes-sent: Your changes were sent to the employment agency. It might take a while before the information is changed, please be patient.
your-information.help-text: Here you find the information we have registered about you. Is this information incorrect? Let us know as soon as possible.

app-themes.no-theme: This internet portal does not have a theme

general-settings.help-text: Here you find the general settings of this Flexportal. The settings cannot be changed here.

messages.page-not-available: This functionality is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
messages.tenant-not-found: Cannot find '{{tenantName}}'. Are you sure the spelling is correct?
messages.this-field-must-be-email: This field must be an email address
messages.this-field-must-be-greater-than-zero: Number must be greater then zero
messages.unauthorized: You do not have sufficient rights for this action

shared-confirm-delete.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shared-confirm-delete.are-you-sure-you-want-to-leave-this-page: Are you sure you want to leave this page?

edit-hours-overlay.times: From {{ start }} till {{ end }} with {{ break }} break
edit-hours-overlay.times-without-break: From {{ start }} till {{ end }} without break

messages.breaktime-longer-then-worktime: The working time must be longer than the break time

timesheets.noopenthisweek: There is no open timesheet for this week.
timesheets.select-a-week-explanation: You can submit worked hours for multiple weeks

summary.explanation: This is your timesheet for the week from {{ startDate }} till {{ endDate }}
summary.instructions: Click on a job to edit or click the Add button to add hours for another job that you worked in
summary.no-jobs-instructions: Click on the Add button to add hours for a job that you worked in
summary.no-jobs-yet: You have not entered hours yet

timesheets.weeks-not-found: There are currently no weeks for which hours have to be submitted
